thread.title: Kiss goodbye to the Control Panel in Windows 10, its days are numbered
thread.title_full: Kiss goodbye to the Control Panel in Windows 10, its days are numbered - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Kiss goodbye to the Control Panel in Windows 10, its days are numbered
text: For Windows stalwarts, the move to Windows 10 has meant embracing a number of changes. Since Windows 8, Microsoft has been keen to push its modern interface, and this is a drive that continues with renewed strength in Windows 10. In ushering in the new, the old has to be let go -- and one of the next features for the chop is the Control Panel. At the moment, Windows 10 users have something of a strange, split experience when customizing the operating system and changing settings. Some things are handled by the old-fashioned Control Panel, others by the Settings… [Continue Reading] »
